name: Be Somewhere Else
description:
On the deepest, darkest nights, there's something out there.

Take a stroll through the night, who knows what you'll find?

Expected play time is 10-15 minutes.

Light on direct input, mostly about seeing what's there.

This was a game I made to learn Unity and general game-dev things! I hope you enjoy it!

Thank you to those who supported me along the way!

CONTROLS!

Arrow keys or WASD to move.

Press Z or Space to interact with the environment.

Pressing ESC opens the pause menu, from there you can adjust the game volume or quit.

Press H for full-screen.

If you're feeling impatient, hold shift to run. Otherwise, take a casual stroll.

KNOWN ISSUES:

Mashing Inputs can cause certain sounds not to play.

In general, mashing inputs at certain times can break some things. Nothing capable of preventing progress (that I know), just non-ideal presentation.

If you find anything that's obviously busted, please let me know!!
